resources.string: Key Mapper requires the use of an accessibility service so that it can detect and change what your button presses do while you are outside of the app. Your key maps will only work once you have enabled the accessibility service. It must also be turned on to create a trigger and test actions.
Key Mapper did not detect any interactions. Try showing additional elements.

IMPORTANT!!! These coordinates are only correct when your display is in the same orientation as the screenshot! This action will cancel any touches or gestures you are doing on the screen.\n\nIf you need help finding the coordinates of a point on your screen take a screenshot and then tap on the screenshot where you want this action to press.
Note: When using \"pinch in\" X and Y are the END coordinates, when using \"pinch out\" X and Y are the START coordinates.

You can either use a system ringtone or select a custom sound file.\n\nThe custom sound file will be copied to Key Mapper\'s private data folder, which means your actions will still work even if the file is moved or deleted. It will also be backed up with your key maps in the zip folder. You can delete saved sound files in the settings.
Can\'t find any paired devices. Is Bluetooth turned on?
Tap a key map to use as a shortcut.
Once you have enabled the device admin, you must DEACTIVATE it if you want to uninstall Key Mapper.
Permission required to work properly in Do Not Disturb mode!
This trigger won\'t work while ringing or in a phone call!

Android doesn\'t let accessibility services detect volume button presses while your phone is ringing or it is in a phone call but it does let input method services detect them. Therefore, you must use the Key Mapper Input Method if you want this trigger to work.
Too many fingers to perform gesture due to android limitations.
Gesture duration is too high due to android limitations.
You must be using the Key Mapper Input Method for DPAD triggers to work!
PRO mode is unsupported on this Android version
Your key maps will stop working randomly!
The accessibility service needs to be turned on for your key maps to work!
Your phone killed Key Mapper when it was in the background or it crashed!
The accessibility service is enabled! Your key maps should work.
Extra logging is turned on! Turn this off if you aren\'t trying to fix an issue.
Turn on notifications for better on-screen messages, more actions and service updates.
Swipe with %d finger(s) from coordinates %d/%d to %d/%d in %dms
Swipe with %d finger(s) from coordinates %d/%d to %d/%d in %dms (%s)
%s with %d finger(s) on coordinates %d/%d with a pinch distance of %dpx in %dms
%s with %d finger(s) on coordinates %d/%d to with a pinch distance of %dpx %dms (%s)
Screenshot resolution doesn\'t match this device\'s resolution!
Copied key map UUID to clipboard
You have saved no sound files!
Key Mapper has used Shizuku to grant itself WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission
Key Mapper has used Root to grant itself WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission
Leave it empty if any WiFi network should be matched.

Follow the amazing guide at dontkillmyapp.com that shows you how to turn off all the app killing "features" on your phone.
\n\nOnce you have read the guide you will need to go to the next slide and restart the accessibility service.
The accessibility service must be restarted. Turn it off and on.
Choose a location to save the bug report to by tapping "create report". The next slide will tell how you can you can send it to the developer.
There are 2 ways to share the bug report to the developer. Either join the Discord server or create a GitHub issue. Make sure that you attach the bug report to your message!
Can\'t find the accessibility settings page
You have unsaved changes. If you discard them, your edits will be lost.
Please grant Key Mapper root permission in your root management app, such as Magisk.
A PC/Mac is required to grant this permission. Read the online guide.
Your device doesn\'t seem to have an accessibility services settings page. Tap \"guide\" to read the online guide that explains how to fix this.
You must hold down the keys in the order that they are listed.
There is a timeout to input this trigger. You can change this timeout in the "Options" tab.

Android doesn\'t allow apps to get a list of connected (not paired) Bluetooth devices. Apps can only detect when they are connected and disconnected. So if your Bluetooth device is already connected to your device when the accessibility service starts, you will have to reconnect it for the app to know it is connected.
Change location or turn off automatic back up?

If you have any other screen lock chosen, such as PIN or Pattern then you don\'t have to worry. But if you have a Password screen lock you will *NOT* be able to unlock your phone if you use the Key Mapper Input Method because it doesn\'t have a GUI. You can grant Key Mapper WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission so it can show a notification to switch to and from the keyboard. There is a guide on how to do this if you tap the question mark at the bottom of the screen.
Select the input method for actions that require one. You can change this later by tapping \"Select keyboard for actions\" in the bottom menu of the home screen.

You MUST read this all otherwise you will get frustrated in the future!

Tapping "fix partially" might prevent Android from stopping the app while it is in the background.

This is NOT ENOUGH. Your OEM's skin such as MIUI or Samsung Experience may have other app killing features so you MUST turn them off for Key Mapper as well by following the online guide at dontkillmyapp.com.
Restart the accessibility service by turning it off and on.

Key Mapper tried to run in the background but was stopped by the system.
This can happen if you have battery or memory optimization turned on.

To fix this, you can try following an online guide. You should also restart the service when you're done.
You have no files app installed that allows you to create a file for Key Mapper. Please install a file manager.
You have no files app installed that allows you to choose a file for Key Mapper. Please install a file manager.
You may need to allow Restricted Settings.

You will be taken to your device\'s settings page to manage which apps can modify the Do Not Disturb state. This is not present on some devices so tap don\'t show again if you do not see Key Mapper in the list.
Drag the handles to adjust priorities. The item at the top is the most important. You can also tap any item to reverse its sort order.
Example: To sort key maps primarily by their Actions in ascending order and secondarily by their Triggers in descending order, move Actions to the first position and Triggers to the second.
Some actions and options need this permission to work. You can also get notified when there is important news about the app.
Tap to start the accessibility service.
The accessibility service has crashed! Your phone might be aggressively killing it! Tap to restart the accessibility service.
Tap \'show keyboard\' to start showing the keyboard again.
Tap \'toggle\' to switch to and from the Key Mapper Input Method.
How long a button should be pressed for it to be detected as a long press. Default is 500ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
How fast does a button have to be double pressed for it to be detected as a double press. Default is 300ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
How long to vibrate if vibrating is enabled for a key map. Default is 200ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
How long the trigger needs to be held down for the action to start repeating. Default is 400ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
The delay between every time an action is repeated. Default is 50ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
The time allowed to complete a sequence trigger. Default is 1000ms. Can be overridden in a key map\'s options.
Every time a key map is triggered
Toggle your key maps on and off
Periodically back up your key maps
Automatically change the on-screen keyboard when a device (e.g a keyboard) connects/disconnects
The Key Mapper Input Method will be automatically selected when a chosen device is connected. Your normal keyboard will be automatically selected when the device disconnects.
Automatically change the on-screen keyboard when you start inputting text
The last used normal on-screen keyboard will be automatically selected when you try to open the keyboard. The Key Mapper Input Method will be automatically selected once you stop using the keyboard.
Show when automatically changing the keyboard
If your device is rooted then this will show the root permission pop up from Magisk or your root app.
Switch between the Key Mapper Input Method and your normal keyboard when you tap the notification.
Toggle Key Mapper Input Method notification
Automatically change the keyboard when toggling key maps
Automatically select the Key Mapper Input Method when you resume your key maps and select your default keyboard when pausing them.
Hide the alerts at the top of the home screen
Differentiate devices with the same name
Share this with the developer if you\'re having issues
Delete sound files that can be used for the Sound action.
1. Shizuku is not installed! Tap to download the Shizuku app.
2. Shizuku is not started! Tap to open the Shizuku app and then read their instructions that explain how to start it.
3. Key Mapper does not have permission to use Shizuku. Tap to grant this permission.
3. Key Mapper will automatically use Shizuku. Tap to read which Key Mapper features use Shizuku.
Are you sure you want to reset all settings in the app to the default? Your existing key maps will not be affected. The introductions and warning pop ups will show again.
These options will only work on root devices! If you don\'t know what root is or whether your device is rooted, please don\'t leave a poor review if they don\'t work. :)
These options are only enabled if Key Mapper has WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission. Click the button below to learn how to grant the permission.
Switch when needed then switch back
Choose which devices trigger automatic keyboard switching
This may add latency to your key maps so only turn this on if you are trying to debug the app or have been asked to by the developer.
Advanced detection of key events and more
Allow other apps to control this key map with intents or shortcuts
Key Mapper accessibility service is disabled
You must be using the Key Mapper Input Method for this action to work!
The app with package name %s isn\'t installed!
You need to grant Key Mapper permission to modify system settings.
Your device doesn\'t have a camera.
Your device doesn\'t have a fingerprint reader.
Your device doesn\'t support device policy enforcement.
Your device doesn\'t have a camera flash.
Your device can not use telephony features. Is a SIM card inserted?
Can\'t find the keyboard settings page!
Key Mapper needs to be a device administrator!
Key Mapper doesn\'t have permission to use that shortcut
The app needs permission to change the Do Not Disturb state!
This action needs permission to read the phone state!
Can\'t find the WRITE_SETTINGS permission page!
Can\'t find the Do Not Disturb access permission settings!
There is no app that can start this phone call
There is no app that can send this SMS
Maximum number of cameras in use!
Accessibility service needs to be enabled!
The accessibility service needs to be restarted!
The Key Mapper Input Method needs to be enabled!
The input method picker can\'t be shown!
Battery optimisation settings not found! If it exists, open it manually.
Battery optimisation is turned on! Turn this off because this can randomly stop Key Mapper from working.
Denied permission to start phone calls!
Denied permission to send SMS messages!
Failed to send SMS. Is the number correct?
Can\'t send SMS. Turn off airplane mode.
Can\'t send SMS. No cellular service.
SMS sending limit exceeded. Try again later.
Can\'t send SMS. Device is out of memory.
Can\'t send SMS during emergency call.
Can\'t send SMS. No SIM card detected.
You will need to update Key Mapper to the latest version to use this backup.
There is no voice assistant installed!
You have no on-screen keyboards installed!
There are no apps playing media!
Your device has no camera app!
Your device has no settings app!
No app can open this url!
The source and target can\'t be the same!
Invalid file. Must be a zip exported from Key Mapper.
You must grant Key Mapper permission to see your paired Bluetooth devices.
Malformed URL. Did you forget the http://?
Denied permission to read fine location!
Denied permission to answer and end phone calls!
Denied permission to see paired Bluetooth devices!
Rate limit reached. You can only send once per second.
Pause media playback for an app
Resume media playback for an app
Play/Pause media playback for an app
Not all media apps support fast forwarding. E.g Google Play Music.
Not all media apps support rewinding. E.g Google Play Music.
Step media forward for an app
Step media backward for an app
Go to last app. (Double press recents)

You will only be able to log back in with your PIN. The fingerprint scanner and face unlock will be disabled. This is the only reliable way I have found to lock non-rooted devices before Android Pie 9.0.
This action will only work if you have tapped on an input field where the keyboard is supposed to be shown.
Some devices require apps to have permission before they can launch apps in the background. Tap \"Read more\" to view the instructions on our website.
Malformed URL. Did you forget the http://?
ADB mode does not support streaming output
No output yet. Click Test to run the command.
Key Mapper can detect and interact with app elements like menus, tabs, buttons and checkboxes. You need to record yourself interacting with the app so that Key Mapper knows what you want to do.
Choose the app to interact with
Choose the element you want your key map to interact with.
Can\'t find what you’re looking for?
Not all apps are compatible. For incompatible apps you can try the Tap Screen action instead.
Select how you want to interact with the UI element.
Close and clear app from recents
Example: screen_off_timeout = 2147483647 (System settings use WRITE_SETTINGS permission)
Example: accessibility_enabled = 1 (Secure settings require system bridge)
Example: airplane_mode_on = 1 (Global settings require system bridge)
A comma-separated list of "true" and "false". E.g true,false,true
A valid Integer in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Integers in the Java programming language. E.g 100,399
A comma separated list. E.g category1,category2
A comma separated list of strings. E.g string1,string2
A valid Long in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Longs in the Java programming language. E.g 102302234234234,399083423234429
A valid Byte in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Bytes in the Java programming language. E.g 123,3
A valid Double in the Java programming language.
A comma-separated list of valid Doubles in the Java programming language. E.g 1.0,3.234
A valid Char in the Java programming language. E.g \'a\' or \'b\'
A comma-separated list of valid Chars in the Java programming language. E.g a,b,c
A valid Float in the Java programming language. E.g 3.145
A comma-separated list of valid Floats in the Java programming language. E.g 1241.123
A valid Short in the Java programming language. E.g 2342
A comma-separated list of valid Shorts in the Java programming language. E.g 3242,12354

The flags for an Intent are stored as bit flags. These flags alter how the Intent is handled. If this is blank for an Activity Intent then Key Mapper will use FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK by default. For much more information tap \'docs\' to see the Android developers documentation.
The open source license for this app.
We don\'t collect any personal information but here is a privacy policy saying this.
Choose add-ons to upgrade your experience
Your support keeps Key Mapper alive!
"Floating button feature is a game changer"
Floating buttons is a game changer!
I\'ve been enjoying the floating buttons feature.
Floating buttons is a brilliant addition.
An essential part of my phone experience.
Not enough buttons? Make instant shortcuts and macros in any app, game or on your lock screen!
Useless side button? Remap the assistant button or your device\'s side key shortcut to whatever you want!
You must purchase the side key trigger feature.
Purchase can not be verified. Do you have an internet connection?
This requires a paid feature that can only be bought by downloading Key Mapper from Google Play.
Network error encountered. Do you have an internet connection?
We are waiting for confirmation from Google Play that your purchase was successful. Reopen the Key\u00A0Mapper app when your card has been successfully charged.
You must purchase the side key trigger feature! Tap on the key map and then purchase it by clicking on \'Advanced triggers\'.
You must purchase the floating buttons feature! Tap on the key map and then purchase it by clicking on \'Advanced triggers\'.

Please fill the following information so I can help you.

1. Device model:
2. Android version:
3. Key maps (make a back up in the home screen menu):
4. Screenshot of Key Mapper home screen:
5. Describe the problem you are having:
Thank you for supporting the app!
Your purchase was successful. As a paying user of Key\u00A0Mapper you will receive priority support to help you use the app. There is now a button in the shop to contact the developer.

The advanced triggers are paid feature but you downloaded the FOSS build of Key Mapper that does not include this closed source module or Google Play billing. Please download Key Mapper from Google Play to get access to this feature.
You can try using the Key Mapper GUI Keyboard app to record your trigger instead of the accessibility service.
Setup complete! Tap \'Done\' and try recording your trigger again. If it doesn’t work then Android will not let it be remapped 🫤.
You can place buttons in any app, even the lock screen.
Floating buttons display over the apps you want. They work just like real buttons, and you can place, style, and map them however you like.
PRO mode provides better compatibility for Caps Lock remapping. Tap \'Use PRO mode\' and record it again.
Use PRO mode if you want your trigger to work when the screen is off. Tap \'Use PRO mode\' and record it again.
Using the back button as a trigger may conflict with app pinning, causing a black screen on unlock. A reboot will fix it.
The ⌨ symbol means you must use the Key Mapper input method for this trigger to work due to an Android restriction.
Consider using PRO mode for ringer mode actions to avoid conflicts with Do Not Disturb settings.
Add constraints in the Constraints tab.
You need to create a floating button before you can use it as a trigger.
You need to choose one floating button to use as a trigger.
Don’t have enough buttons? Now you can make your own!
Floating buttons display over the apps you want. They work just like real buttons, and you can place, style, and map them however you like.
Tap a key map to configure it.\nLong press for more options.
Create a key map!\n\nA key map is a rule to tell your device what to do when a button is pressed.
Floating buttons display over the apps you want. They work just like real buttons, and you can place, style, and map them however you like.
Layouts let you organize floating buttons into groups. They do not affect which buttons can be shown. Any button from any layout can be shown at the same time.
Are you sure you want to delete this layout of floating buttons?
You can find floating buttons in the Advanced Triggers button when creating a trigger.
Would you like to replace all your existing key maps or append them to the list?
Are you sure you want to delete these key maps?
Keys can be identified by either a \'key code\' or a \'scan code\'. A scan code is more unique than a key code but your trigger may not work on other devices. We recommend using key codes.
Add actions to set what the key map should do once triggered.
Are you sure you want to delete this action?
Run these actions when you trigger the key map:
This device does not let you change the brightness.
Add constraints if you want key maps to only work in some situations.
Are you sure you want to delete this constraint?
This key map will only run if:
Are you sure you want to delete this group? All the key maps in this group and its subgroups will also be deleted!

Remapping buttons with PRO mode is dangerous and can cause them to stop working if you remap them incorrectly.\n\nIf you make a mistake, you may need to force restart your device by holding down the power and volume buttons for 30 seconds — consult your device\'s manual or the internet for how to do this.
You can skip the set up process by giving Key Mapper root permission. This will let Key Mapper auto start PRO mode on boot as well.
You can skip the set up process by giving Key Mapper Shizuku permission.
Enable PRO mode for all key maps
Key Mapper will use the ADB Shell for remapping
These settings are unavailable until you acknowledge the warning.
PRO Mode will start itself whenever you turn on or restart your device
Select how key event actions are performed
If your power button stops working, hold down the power button for 10 seconds and release to disable PRO Mode.
Key Mapper uses a service to help you set up PRO mode. It\'s also useful for ordinary key maps.
Key Mapper needs to use Android Debug Bridge to start PRO mode, and you need to enable developer options for that.
Key Mapper needs a WiFi network to enable ADB. You do not need an internet connection.\n\nNo WiFi network? Use a hotspot from someone else\'s phone.
Key Mapper uses wireless debugging to launch its remapping and input service.
Key Mapper needs to pair with wireless debugging before it can launch its remapping and input service.
Key Mapper needs to connect to the Android Debug Bridge to start the PRO mode service.
Key Mapper needs permission to notify you if there are any issues with the set up process.
You can now remap buttons when the screen is off and use more actions.
Searching for pairing code and port…
Unable to find pairing port and code
Tap on the button to pair with pairing code and type the code in here
Tap to set up again. Try ADB pairing and rebooting your phone if it repeatedly fails.
Keep the pairing code popup on-screen when submitting the pairing code
What can I do with PRO mode?

📲 You can remap more buttons, such as your power button.\n⌨️ Use any keyboard with key code actions.\n⭐️ The following actions are unlocked: WiFi, Bluetooth, mobile data, NFC, and airplane mode, collapse status bar, and sleep/wake device.
Not auto restarting. If you\'re not killing the service report the issue to the developer.
What do you want to remap?
Floating buttons are instant shortcuts in any app, game or on your lock screen. Your support keeps Key Mapper alive ❤️
You might be able to remap this button
You might be able to remap this device
You might be able to use this feature
Remap when the screen is off
Remap when the screen is off
If your buttons still cannot be detected, please join our Discord server and let us know. We will do our best to help you remap your buttons.
If your buttons cannot be detected please join our Discord server and let us know. We will do our best to help you remap your buttons.
Not available on this Android version
If your device assistant is triggered by a hardware button, it might be possible to remap it for free with PRO mode. Try choosing \'Other\' from the trigger page and follow the instructions.
This trigger requires some set up that varies per device. Please\

If your device assistant is triggered by the power button, it might be possible to remap the assistant instead, meaning you don\'t need to use PRO mode. Try choosing \'Assistant\' from the trigger page and follow the instructions.
You will not be able to use your normal on-screen keyboard when remapping DPAD buttons.
There are extra steps to use this action. Select which method you want to use:
Can use your normal on-screen keyboard at all times
Better compatibility with apps and games
Automatically switch to normal on-screen keyboard when typing
You can always change this in Settings
Sending SMS may incur carrier or roaming charges. Key Mapper developers are not liable for any costs.
We would love to know! Please consider leaving a review on Google Play to help others discover this feature. ❤️
